eventDecorators.name: Deposited
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: ForwarderCreated
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: SafeModeActivated
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: SafeModeInActivated
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: TokensTransfer
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

eventDecorators.name: Transacted
eventDecorators.description: event Withdrawal emit on every SafeWithdraw.

functionDecorators.name: activateSafeMode
functionDecorators.description: Irrevocably puts contract into safe mode. When in this mode, transactions may only be sent to signing addresses.

functionDecorators.name: flushForwarderTokens
functionDecorators.description: Execute a token flush from one of the forwarder addresses. This transfer needs only a single signature and can be done by any signer.

parameterDecorators.name: forwarderAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the forwarder address to flush the tokens from.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenContractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the erc20 token contract.

functionDecorators.name: getNextSequenceId
functionDecorators.description: Gets the next available sequence ID for signing when using executeAndConfirm returns the sequenceId one higher than the highest currently stored.

functionDecorators.name: isOperator
functionDecorators.description: Determine if an address is an operator on this wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: address to check returns boolean indicating whether address is operator or not.

functionDecorators.name: isSigner
functionDecorators.description: Determine if an address is a signer on this wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: signer
parameterDecorators.description: address to check returns boolean indicating whether address is signer or not.

functionDecorators.name: sendMultiSig
functionDecorators.description: Execute a multi-signature transaction from this wallet using 2 signers: one from msg.sender and the other from ecrecover. Sequence IDs are numbers starting from 1. They are used to prevent replay attacks and may not be repeated.

parameterDecorators.name: toAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the destination address to send an outgoing transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: the amount in Wei to be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: the data to send to the toAddress when invoking the transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: expireTime
parameterDecorators.description: the number of seconds since 1970 for which this transaction is valid.

parameterDecorators.name: sequenceId
parameterDecorators.description: the unique sequence id obtainable from getNextSequenceId.

functionDecorators.name: sendMultiSigToken
functionDecorators.description: Execute a multi-signature token transfer from this wallet using 2 signers: one from msg.sender and the other from ecrecover. Sequence IDs are numbers starting from 1. They are used to prevent replay attacks and may not be repeated.

parameterDecorators.name: toAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the destination address to send an outgoing transaction.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: the amount in tokens to be sent.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenContractAddress
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the erc20 token contract.

parameterDecorators.name: expireTime
parameterDecorators.description: the number of seconds since 1970 for which this transaction is valid.

parameterDecorators.name: sequenceId
parameterDecorators.description: the unique sequence id obtainable from getNextSequenceId.
